pr_title: [JBPM-9248] RuntimeDataServiceCDIImplTest must abort process before deleting tables at after

timeline.bodyText:
not sure why do we need to remove this line? Don't we have to abort instances before removing data from the tables?
Also, same method will be called in the @after method cleanup once this test is finished.
timeline.author: afalhambra

replies.bodyText: In the after method, it will be aborted as other tests, so it's not strictly needed. Before this fixing, it was necessary for CDI tests to avoid failing and it was the main clue for understanding what was happening.
replies.author: gmunozfe

timeline.bodyText: this method is checking for the correlationKey rather than pids. Probably in this case correlationKey = pid always? would it not make sense to modify assertTasks method to fetch pids instead of correlationKey? all the calls to this method are passing pids. What do you think?
timeline.author: afalhambra

replies.bodyText: the goal for this assertTasks method is to verify that correlationKey and processType have the expected value (pids and process respectively), as it was introduced in the jbpm#1680
replies.author: gmunozfe

timeline.author: afalhambra
